Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_redbook_open_volume

The function AIL_redbook_open_volume opens a Red Book CD-audio device from a MacOS volume name.

HREDBOOK AIL_redbook_open_volume(
  char const * volume
);

In Parameters

volume
specifies which CD volume.

Returns

A handle to the Red Book device, or NULL if the device couldn't be opened.

Discussion

This MacOS-only function just opens a channel to the device - it doesn't check to see if an audio CD is inserted. Use AIL_redbook_status to check for audio CDs.

Under MacOS, this function must not be invoked from an interrupt-based callback function.


Group: CD Audio (Redbook) Services
Related Functions: AIL_redbook_close, AIL_redbook_open, AIL_redbook_open_drive, AIL_redbook_status
Related Basic Types: HREDBOOK, char const *
